auth_switch_to_login: Already have an account? Sign in
auth_switch_to_register: Don't have an account? Register here.
auth_username_error_too_short: Username must be at least 3 characters long.
auth_password_error_weak: Password is too weak. Try adding numbers, symbols or capital letters.
auth_error_email_invalid: Please enter a valid email address.
auth_error_password_min: Your password must be at least 8 characters long.
auth_error_password_max: Your password must be at most 32 characters long.
auth_acount_exists_with_different_creden: Account already exists with a different connexion type. Try email and password, for example
auth_auth_domain_config_required: Auth domain config required. Please contact an administrator.
auth_operation_not_allowed: Operation not allowed. Please contact an administrator.
auth_operation_not_supported_in_this_env: Operation not supported in this environment. Please contact an administrator.
auth_popup_blocked: Popup blocked. Please allow popups for this website and try again.
auth_unauthorized_domain: Unauthorized domain. Please contact an administrator.
auth_email_already_in_use: Email already in use. Consider signing in instead or use a different email address.
auth_invalid_login_credentials: Wrong email or password. Please try again.
auth_register_goal_bodybuilding_descript: Bodybuilding focused programs have higher reps (8-15) and a wider range of exercises
auth_register_goal_powerbuilding_descrip: Powerbuilding programs build strength and muscle using both heavy barbell exercises and high rep bodybuilding exercises
auth_register_goal_powerlifting_descript: Powerlifting focuses on bench press, squat and deadlift with lower reps but higher reps, with the goal of reaching higher personal records
auth_register_goal_calisthenics_descript: Calisthenics programs offer at home exercises that help you get strong and fit with minimal equipment using bodyweight
auth_register_goal_sculpting_description: Sculpting programs are muscle toning programs that are female-focused and that put emphasis on lower body exercises
auth_register_experience: For how long have you been training?
auth_register_experience_beginner_descri: You've never trained before or just started and you want to learn the basics. At this level you need to learn fundamentals with machine, bodyweight and free weight exercises
auth_register_experience_novice_descript: You have under 1 year of training or you're getting out of a 6 months or more break. At this level weight or reps will likely go up from workout to workout
auth_register_experience_intermediate_de: You have 1 to 3 years of consistent training and are searching for more. At this level it's hard to progress without a structured program, and progress will go up from month to month
auth_register_experience_advanced_descri: You have more than 3 years of consistent training and you've reached many plateaus. At this level progress is hard and requires advanced traning techniques
auth_register_equipment: What equipment do you have available?
auth_register_equipment_full_gym_descrip: You have a range of machines, racks, barbells and dumbells
auth_register_equipment_garage_gym_descr: You have a squat rack, a barbell and a few dumbells
auth_register_equipment_dumbbells_descri: You only have dumbbells or kettlebells
auth_register_equipment_at_home_descript: You have limited to no equipment and want to use your bodyweight at home
auth_register_frequencies: How many days per week do you train?
auth_register_frequencies_2_description: Usually for beginners or people that do multiple sports
